title: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       News  The National Park Service makes every effort to keep you informed about news events, special events, park programs and services, and new or ongoing projects. News Releases for Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park will be posted, so check back often to keep current about happenings at the park.   Social Media  To stay connected and learn what's happening at Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park, follow us at Twitter http://twitter.com/KennesawNPS and like us at Facebook http://www.facebook.com/KMNBP.   Mailing List Subcribe to our mailing list to receive monthly newsletters on events at Kennesaw Mountain!
